body_html:
this example creates a reference cycle between b and c, and hence the garbage collector needs to be kicked in to free the held tensors. You can invoke the gc by doing:

import gc
gc.collect()
body_text:
this example creates a reference cycle between b and c, and hence the garbage collector needs to be kicked in to free the held tensors. You can invoke the gc by doing:
import gc
gc.collect()
body:
this example creates a reference cycle between `b` and `c`, and hence the garbage collector needs to be kicked in to free the held tensors. You can invoke the gc by doing:

```
import gc
gc.collect()
```
